docs.summary: Short description of DraftOrders

operations.name: Add Line Items To Draft Order

params.name: catalogLineItems
params.doc: Catalog Line items ref to be added.

params.name: customLineItems
params.doc: Custom line items to be added.

docs.summary:
*
Add items to a draft order.

params.name: reason
params.doc: Reason for edit, given by user (optional).

docs.summary:
*
Commit latest changes to the baseline order and control what side-effects will be applied.
Commit cannot be undone or reverted.
Order-edit become closed for editing, however it's kept for reference and can be retrieved.

params.name: customAdditionalFees
params.doc: The additional fees to add. added with opted-out setting

docs.summary:
*
Create custom additional fees to the order.
added additional fees are by default opted-out.
To opt-in them, please call SetAdditionalFees with the added additional fee ids.

*
Add merchant discounts to the order.

params.name: orderId
params.doc: To create a draft from existing order, provide its id. Otherwise, an empty draft will be created.

docs.summary:
*
Begin editing an existing order.
An order can be edited only once at a time.
Finish editing by CommitDraftOrder or DiscardDraftOrder.
if order is already editable by same client, then an existing DraftOrder will be returned.
if not edited then create a new DraftOrder entity.

*
Remove custom additional fees from the order.

*
Remove custom discounts from the order.

*
Delete order-edit entity with all pending changes.
Order-edit in status 'COMMITTED' cannot be deleted.

*
Get an order.
When order is in draft status, it's re-estimated and return with latest tax and totals
Automatic discounts and automatic additional fees will reflect the latest prices and eligibility.
Calculation will be based on current draft order content - items, shipping info and eligible discounts and additional fees.
When order is in committed status, it's returned with it's calculation at the moment it was committed.
Checks whether a draft can be created for thos order
Query draft orders by order id or by date range or status.

params.name: additionalFees
params.doc: The additional fees ids to opt-in. all existing additional fees not listed are to be opted-out

docs.summary:
*
Set which additional fees existing on the draft order are to be opt-in.
All existing additional fees not provided on the call are opted-out.

params.name: discounts
params.doc:
The discount ids to opt-in. all existing discounts not listed are to be opted-out.
todo: add (.wix.api.maxSize). need to find it. existing : merchant can have 100 + 1 coupon + ? due to automatic discounts

docs.summary:
*
Set which discount existing on the draft order are to be opt-in.
All existing discounts not provided on the call are opted-out.

params.name: lineItemChanges
params.doc: Details of changes to apply per line item

docs.summary:
*
Modify items on the order.
Allows to change price per unit or quantity of each item.
Price per unit change affects whole quantity of the item.
Quantity of 0 will remove the item from the order.
Limitations:
1. Price cannot be changed for items set with paymentType of membership.
2. Quantity cannot be decreased for fulfilled items.

params.name: shippingOption
params.doc: update the shipping option on the order. if not set then the selected shipping is removed

docs.summary:
*
Update shipping information on the order.
Allows also to remove the order shipping info.

messages.name: _com_wix_ecom_orders_draft_v1_DraftOrderEntityCreatedEvent
messages.displayName: Draft Order Entity Created Event Object

docs.summary:
Order balance. Reflects amount left to be paid on order and is calculated dynamically. Can be negative per balance definition.
`amount` field depends on order payment status:
+ UNSPECIFIED, NOT_PAID: price_summary.total_price
+ PARTIALLY_PAID : price_summary.total_price - pay_now.total_price
+ PENDING, REFUNDED, PARTIALLY_REFUNDED, PAID : 0

members.name: amount
members.doc:
Balance amount, can be negative. Negative value signifies amount to be refunded
 and can happen due to possible overcharge or modified manual order.

members.name: balance
members.doc: collectible amount to pay. Part of orderâ€™s price_summary excluding all approved payments amount

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. deprecated in API's - to enable migration from rendering arbitrary tracing to rest response

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: tracing
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. deprecated in API's - to enable migration from rendering arbitrary tracing to rest response

docs.summary: Used for grouping line items and is sent on add to cart

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within its Wix or 3rd-party catalog. For example, `productId` for Wix Stores or `bookingId` for Wix Bookings.

members.name: appId
members.doc:
ID of the app providing the catalog. For items from Wix apps, the following values always apply:
+ Wix Stores: `"215238eb-22a5-4c36-9e7b-e7c08025e04e"`
+ Wix Bookings: `"13d21c63-b5ec-5912-8397-c3a5ddb27a97"`

members.name: options
members.doc:
Additional info in key:value pairs. For example, to specify Wix Stores product options or variants:
+ `{"options": {"options": {"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}}}`
+ `{"options": {"variantId": "<VARIANT_ID>"}}`

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc: Catalog and item reference. Includes IDs for the item and the catalog it came from, as well as further optional info.

members.name: relativePath
members.doc: The path to that page - e.g /product-page/a-product

members.name: url
members.doc: The URL of that page. e.g https://mysite.com/product-page/a-product

members.name: weight
members.doc: Line item weight. Measurement unit (KG or LB) is taken from `order.weightUnit`.

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this line item is shippable.

members.name: original
members.doc:
__Required.__ Original item name in site's default language.  
Min: 1 character  
Max: 200 characters

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Optional. Translated item name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.  
Min: 1 character  
Max: 400 characters

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated description line item according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line plain text value in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated description line plain text value according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line color name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated description line color name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: code
members.doc: HEX or RGB color code for display.

members.name: original
members.doc: **Required.** Original price description in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated price description according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc: Catalog and item reference. Includes IDs for the item and the catalog it came from, as well as further optional info.

members.name: url
members.doc: URL to the item's page on the site.

members.name: price
members.doc: Item price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: lineItemPrice
members.doc: Total line item price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Item price **before** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscounts
members.doc: Item price **before** line item discounts and **after** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for display purposes for order.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU, item weight, and shippability.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: deliveryProfileId
members.doc: Delivery Profile Id for the product

members.name: applyToDraftOrder
members.doc:
Should apply the additional fee. default = false.
 if not set or false, then to apply them, please call ApplyAdditionalFees with the added additional fee ids

members.name: code
members.doc: Additional fee's unique code (or ID) for future processing

members.name: taxable
members.doc: Indication if additional fee is taxable or not

members.name: taxGroupId
members.doc: Optional tax group ID to use when calculating tax for this additional fee

members.name: type
members.doc:
Tax type.

Supported values:
+ `CPF`: for individual tax payers
+ `CNPJ`: for corporations

docs.summary: Physical address

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

docs.summary: Full contact details for an address

members.name: vatId
members.doc: Tax information (for Brazil only). If ID is provided, `vatId.type` must also be set, `UNSPECIFIED` is not allowed.

docs.summary: Billing Info and shipping details
Physical address

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with number, name, and apartment number in separate fields.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Taxable amount of this line item.

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: Tax rate percentage, as a decimal numeral between 0 and 1. For example, `"0.13"`.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: The calculated tax, based on the `taxableAmount` and `taxRate`.

docs.summary:
the amount on which tax is calculated, added from line items
com.wix.ecommerce.platform_common.api.Price taxable_amount = 1 [(.wix.api.readOnly) = true];

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Shipping price after all discounts (if any exist), and after tax.

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: App Def Id of external provider which was a source of shipping info

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code (or ID) of selected shipping option. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"``.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Shipping option title.
 For example, `"USPS Standard Overnight Delivery"`, `"Standard"` or `"First-Class Package International"`.

docs.summary:
unique identifier of the shipping region
    google.protobuf.StringValue id = 1 [(.wix.api.format) = GUID, (.wix.api.readOnly) = true];

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of shipping region. For example, `"Metropolitan London"`, or `"Outer Melbourne suburbs"`.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: Expected delivery time in free text. For example, `"3-5 business days"`.

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Instructions for carrier. For example, `"Please knock on the door. If unanswered, please call contact number. Thanks."`.

members.name: deliverByDate
members.doc: Deprecated - Latest expected delivery date and time in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.

members.name: from
members.doc: starting time of the delivery time slot

members.name: to
members.doc: ending time of the delivery time slot

members.name: fileId
members.doc: ID of the secure file in media.

members.name: link
members.doc: Link will exist after the digital links have been generated on the order.

members.name: cycleNumber
members.doc: Subscription cycle. For example, if this order is for the 3rd cycle of a subscription, value will be `3`.

members.name: subscriptionOptionTitle
members.doc: Subscription option title. For example, `"Monthly coffee Subscription"`.

members.name: subscriptionOptionDescription
members.doc: Subscription option description. For example, `"1kg of selected coffee, once a month"`.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: id
members.doc: Location id in the associated owner app.

members.name: appId
members.doc: Location owner app, if not provided then the site business info locations will be used.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc:
References to the line item's origin catalog.
 This field is empty in the case of a custom line item.

members.name: totalDiscount
members.doc: Total discount for this line item's entire quantity.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for display purposes for the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU and item weight.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc:
Fulfiller ID. Field is empty when the line item is self-fulfilled.
 To get fulfillment information, pass the order ID to [List Fulfillments For Single Order](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-fulfillments/list-fulfillments-for-single-order).

members.name: restockQuantity
members.doc: quantity of inventory requested to be returned. Whether to restock or ignore the request is up the vertical.

members.name: price
members.doc: Line item price after line item discounts for display purposes.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscounts
members.doc: Line item price before line item discounts for display purposes. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total price after all discounts and tax.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`.
 + `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
 + `FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, check, or other offline payment methods.
 + `MEMBERSHIP` - Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is 0.
 + `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` - Partial payment for the given item to be paid upfront during the checkout. Eligible for catalog items with type `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` only.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details for this line item.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: depositAmount
members.doc: Item's price amount to be charged during checkout, relevant for items with payment option DEPOSIT_ONLINE

docs.summary: Coupon

members.name: original
members.doc: Original discount rule name (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated discount rule name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: discountType
members.doc:
Discount type.
 * `"GLOBAL"` - discount applies to entire order.
 * `"SPECIFIC-ITEMS"` - discount applies to specific items.
 * `"SHIPPING"` - discount applies to shipping. For example, free shipping.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of line items discount applies to.

members.name: discountReason
members.doc:
Pre-defined discount reason (optional).
 * `"ITEMS_EXCHANGE"` - exchange balance acquired as a result of items exchange.

members.name: code
members.doc: Additional fee's unique code for future processing.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc:
Optional - Line items associated with this additional fee.
 If no `lineItemIds` are provided, the fee will be associated with the whole cart/checkout/order.

members.name: priceDescriptionBeforeChange
members.doc: The price description before the change

members.name: ChangeType
members.doc:
Type and details of the change versus the baseline order
 None means didn't change.

members.name: shippingInfoBeforeChange
members.doc: The shipping details before the change.

members.name: ChangeType
members.doc: type and details of the change versus the baseline order. None if not changed.

members.name: additionalFee
members.doc: An additional fee which can be applied to the order.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details for the additional fee

members.name: source
members.doc: What is the source of this fee.

members.name: applied
members.doc: Was the fee applied to the order.

members.name: discount
members.doc: A discount which can be applied to the order.

members.name: source
members.doc: What is the source of this discount.

members.name: applied
members.doc: Was the discount applied to the order.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Total shipping price, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: total
members.doc: Orderâ€™s total price after discounts and tax.

members.name: totalAdditionalFees
members.doc: Total price of additional fees before tax.

members.name: balance
members.doc: collectible amount to pay. Part of orderâ€™s price_summary excluding all approved payments amount

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID. Auto-created if one does not yet exist. For more information, see [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/introduction).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID (if site visitor is not a member).

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID (if site visitor is a site member).

docs.summary:
*
DraftOrder is the main entity of DraftOrders service. It represents a single edit order.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID which this order's edit is related to

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the draft order was created. in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the edit order was last updated. in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: ID of the edit order's initiator.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit - defaults to site's weight unit.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for the pricing of this order in [ISO-4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#List_of_ISO_4217_currency_codes) format.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID (if order created by a member).

members.name: purchaseFlowId
members.doc: Persistent ID that correlates between the various eCommerce elements: cart, checkout, and order.

members.name: userId
members.doc: User ID - when the edit order was created by a Wix user

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the edit order was created by an external application.

docs.summary: Side-effects upon committing a draft order.

members.name: sendNotificationsToBuyer
members.doc: If false, do not send notifications to buyer. Default is true.

members.name: sendNotificationsToBusiness
members.doc: If false, do not send notifications to business. Default is true.

members.name: addActivitiesToOrder
members.doc: If false,do not add activities to the order. Default is true.

members.name: sendNotificationsToCustomFulfillers
members.doc: If false, do not send mails to custom fulfillers in case of a change of shippable items fulfilled by custom fulfillers. Default is true.

members.name: updateInventory
members.doc: Item ids to perform inventory change for. If not provided, inventory change will not be performed.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: hasNext
members.doc:
Indicates if there are more results after the current page.
 If `true`, another page of results can be retrieved.
 If `false`, this is the last page.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: discountType
members.doc:
Discount type.
 * `"GLOBAL"` - discount applies to entire order.
 * `"SPECIFIC-ITEMS"` - discount applies to a specific item.
 * `"SHIPPING"` - discount applies to shipping. For example, free shipping.

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of line item discount applies to.

members.name: applyToDraftOrder
members.doc:
Should opt-in the added discount. default = false.
 if not set or false, then to opt-in them, please call SetDiscounts with the added discounts ids

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code that acts as an ID for a shipping rate. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"`.

members.name: title
members.doc: Shipping rate title. For example, `"USPS Standard Overnight Delivery"`, `"Standard"`, or `"First-Class Package International"`.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: When the item is expected to be delivered in free text, e.g "3-5 business days"

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Instructions for caller, e.g for pickup: "Ensure to come during Opening Hours, and please don't park in disabled-spot"

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Additional pickup details if it's a pickup

members.name: deliveryTimeSlot
members.doc: Expected delivery time slot (from and to time stamps representation)

members.name: from
members.doc: starting time of the delivery time slot

members.name: to
members.doc: ending time of the delivery time slot

members.name: price
members.doc: The shipping rate's price. Must align with the [currency's decimal separator](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes).

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency of the shipping rate price as a 3-letter [ISO-4217 currency code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217). Must align with the `currency` passed to the function.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for edit, given by user (optional).

members.name: diff
members.doc: Difference between original and new quantity. Absolute value.

members.name: deltaType
members.doc: Type of quantity change: increase or decrease.

members.name: name
members.doc: Discount name: coupon name / discount rule name / merchant discount description.

members.name: affectedLineItems
members.doc: Line items additional fee applies to.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Amount associated with this item. (Discount amount for item / additional fee amount for item)

members.name: originalTotal
members.doc: Orderâ€™s total price after discounts and tax. Before update

members.name: newTotal
members.doc: Orderâ€™s total price after discounts and tax. After update

members.name: orderRefunded
members.doc: Additional info about order refunded activity (optional). `activity.type` must be `ORDER_REFUNDED`.

docs.summary: Store owner added a comment

members.name: manual
members.doc: Whether order was refunded manually. For example, via payment provider or using cash.

members.name: originalOrderId
members.doc: ID of the original order for which the exchange happened.

members.name: exchangeOrderId
members.doc: ID of the new order created as a result of an exchange of items.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: IDs of the items that were exchanged.

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the exchanged line item.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Additional data in key-value form. For example, `{ "Ticket number": "123456" }`.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that created the custom activity.

members.name: type
members.doc: Custom activity type. For example, `"Ticket number set"`.

members.name: additionalData
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Additional data in key-value form. For example, `{ "Ticket number": "123456" }`.

members.name: userId
members.doc:
User ID - when the order was created by a Wix user on behalf of a buyer.
 For example, via POS (point of service).

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID - when the order was created by a **logged in** site visitor.

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID - when the order was created by a site visitor that was **not** logged in.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the order was created by an external application.

members.name: type
members.doc: Sales channel that submitted the order.

members.name: externalOrderId
members.doc: Reference to an order ID from an external system.

members.name: externalOrderUrl
members.doc: URL to the order in the external system.

members.name: statuses
members.doc: Unique string values based on Fulfillment entities statuses

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs.  
Extended field data. Each key corresponds to the namespace of the app that created the extended fields.
The value of each key is structured according to the schema defined when the extended fields were configured.

You can only access fields for which you have the appropriate permissions.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type struct

members.name: namespaces
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.  
Extended field data. Each key corresponds to the namespace of the app that created the extended fields.
The value of each key is structured according to the schema defined when the extended fields were configured.

You can only access fields for which you have the appropriate permissions.

members.name: number
members.doc: Order number displayed in the site owner's dashboard (auto-generated).

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the order was created in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the order was last updated in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Order payment status.
+ `NOT_PAID` - This can be an order made online, but not yet paid. In such cases `order.status` will be `INITIALIZED`.
+ This status also applies when an offline order needs to be manually marked as paid. In such cases `order.status` will be `APPROVED`.
+ `PAID` - All payments associated with this order are paid. For online payments: [`payment.regularPaymentDetails.status: APPROVED`](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-transactions/order-transactions-object). For gift cards: [`payment.giftCardPaymentDetails.voided: false`](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-transactions/order-transactions-object).
+ `PARTIALLY_REFUNDED` - Order was refunded, but refund amount is less than order total price.
+ `FULLY_REFUNDED` - Order fully refunded. Refund amount equals total price.
+ `PENDING` - Payments received but not yet confirmed by the payment provider.
+ `PARTIALLY_PAID` -  At least one payment was received and approved, covering less than total price amount.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language for communication with the buyer. Defaults to the site language.
 For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the buyer selected.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit - defaults to site's weight unit.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for the pricing of this order in [ISO-4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#List_of_ISO_4217_currency_codes) format.

members.name: taxIncludedInPrices
members.doc: Whether tax is included in line item prices.

members.name: siteLanguage
members.doc: Site language in which original values are shown.

members.name: shippingInfo
members.doc: Shipping info and selected shipping option details.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Order status.
+ `INITIALIZED` - Order was created, but not yet approved or declined.
+ `APPROVED` - Order was approved. This happens when either the online payment succeeded or the order is an offline order. Once an order is approved, many side effects are triggered. For example, holding of stock in the inventory and sending of notification emails.
+ `CANCELED` - Order was canceled by the user.

members.name: channelInfo
members.doc: Information about the sales channel that submitted this order.

members.name: seenByAHuman
members.doc: Whether a human has seen the order. Set when an order is clicked on in the dashboard.

members.name: additionalFees
members.doc: Additional fees applied to the order.

members.name: extendedFields
members.doc: Extensions enabling users to save custom data related to the order. See details here https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields

members.name: purchaseFlowId
members.doc: Persistent ID that correlates between the various eCommerce elements: cart, checkout, and order.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: To create a draft from existing order, provide its id. Otherwise, an empty draft will be created.

members.name: calculatedDraftOrder
members.doc: The draft order details calculated with latest content

members.name: draftOrder
members.doc:
The draft order full details with calculations based on it's content.
 Discount and additional fee options are also included.

docs.summary:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • VALIDATION
  • OTHER
  • MAX
  • MIN
  • MAX_LENGTH
  • MIN_LENGTH
  • MAX_SIZE
  • MIN_SIZE
  • FORMAT
  • DECIMAL_LTE
  • DECIMAL_GTE
  • DECIMAL_LT
  • DECIMAL_GT
  • DECIMAL_MAX_SCALE
  • INVALID_ENUM_VALUE
  • REQUIRED_FIELD
  • FIELD_NOT_ALLOWED
  • ONE_OF_ALIGNMENT

Possible values are:
  • UNRECOGNISED
  • PHYSICAL
  • DIGITAL
  • GIFT_CARD
  • SERVICE

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • SECURE_PICTURE
  • SECURE_VIDEO
  • SECURE_DOCUMENT
  • SECURE_MUSIC
  • SECURE_ARCHIVE

Possible values are:
  • UNRECOGNISED
  • PLAIN_TEXT
  • COLOR

tax info types Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • CPF - CPF - for individual tax payers.
  • CNPJ - CNPJ - for corporations

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_METHOD
  • STORE_PICKUP
  • PICKUP_POINT

Frequency unit of recurring payment Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • DAY
  • WEEK
  • MONTH
  • YEAR

Type of selected payment option for catalog item Possible values are:
  • FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE - The entire payment for given item will happen as part of the checkout.
  • FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE - The entire payment for given item will happen after the checkout.
  • MEMBERSHIP - Given item cannot be paid via monetary payment options, only via membership. When this option is used, price will always be 0.
  • DEPOSIT_ONLINE - Partial payment for the given item to be paid upfront during the checkout. Amount to be paid is defined by `deposit_amount` field on per-item basis.
  • MEMBERSHIP_OFFLINE - Payment for this item can only be done using a membership and must be manually redeemed in the dashboard by the site owner. Note: when this option is used, price will be 0.

Possible values are:
  • GLOBAL
  • SPECIFIC_ITEMS
  • SHIPPING

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • EXCHANGED_ITEMS

Possible values are:
  • ORIGINAL_ORDER - Part of the original order
  • AUTOMATIC - Added by estimate
  • CUSTOM - Added manually to current draft order

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT - Weight unit can't be classified, due to an error
  • KG - Kilograms
  • LB - Pounds

Possible values are:
  • DRAFT - DraftOrder is in draft state.
  • COMMITTED - DraftOrder is in committed state.

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_TYPE
  • GLOBAL
  • SPECIFIC_ITEMS
  • SHIPPING

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_METHOD
  • STORE_PICKUP
  • PICKUP_POINT

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • PARTIALLY_OR_FULLY_REFUNDED
  • UNSUPPORTED_CHANNEL_TYPE
  • ORDER_STATUS_IS_NOT_SUPPORTED
  • ORDER_AND_SITE_CURRENCIES_ARE_INCONSISTENT
  • ORDER_AND_SITE_WEIGHT_UNITS_ARE_INCONSISTENT
  • AMOUNTS_DO_NOT_ADD_UP
  • ORDER_NOT_FOUND
  • SUBSCRIPTION_LINE_ITEM_EXISTS
  • UNSUPPORTED_CATALOG_ITEM

Possible values are:
  • NOT_FULFILLED - none of the order items are fulfilled or order was manually marked as unfulfilled
  • FULFILLED - All of the order items are fulfilled or order was manually marked as fulfilled Orders without shipping info are fulfilled automatically
  • PARTIALLY_FULFILLED - Some, but not all of the order items are fulfilled

Possible values are:
  • INITIALIZED
  • APPROVED
  • CANCELED

  • FULLY_REFUNDED - Full order total price was refunded
  • PENDING - Payments received but not yet confirmed by the payment provider
